## Course Overview

This course provides a structured, practical introduction to **Python for Data Analysis**, covering programming fundamentals, data manipulation, visualization, statistics, and applied projects.

The notes are organized into **daily lectures**, designed for **online live sessions**, with hands-on examples and real-world datasets.

---
